meta.description: The official website of the 'Spārni' association, led by Astrīda Kinne. The website includes an online store, information about events and news, as well as organizational activities that help women through education, crafts, and community development.

openGraph.title: Spārni Association - Empowering Women Through Crafts and Education
openGraph.description: Join the 'Spārni' association to explore crafts, attend events, and shop for unique handmade items created by local women. The association supports women in their personal and professional growth.

home.title: Association Wings
home.button: Learn more about the Wings association
home.quote: Handmade products are crafted by hand using various craft techniques to create unique and aesthetic items. These products often combine an artistic approach with practical applications, such as clothing, accessories, decorative elements, or household items.

about.title: About Us
about.description: The "Spārni" Association is an organization that provides support to women by helping them address various issues, promoting education and development, and participating in handicraft fairs and events. Our goal is to train women in handicraft skills, offering guest lectures, exchange trips, and many other activities that promote community education and social integration.
about.mission: We collaborate with several organizations and participate in various exhibitions both in Latvia and abroad, to help promote the work of our members. Our members, mainly women, engage in various projects and charity activities, selling their handmade products in our physical store as well as in our online shop.
about.invitation: We invite you to join our activities, participate in our events, and explore the opportunity to purchase unique handicrafts in our online store.

contacts.title: Craft House
contacts.description: The Craft House in Ventspils is our physical location where you can view and purchase our creations in person, in addition to our online store. Various events and exhibitions also take place here, where you can explore the work of our artisans.
contacts.mapDescription: Physical store location on the map

news.title: Latest News
news.description: Learn about our latest projects, events, and craft exhibitions! Stay up to date with our news and discover unique handmade creations crafted with love and care. Join our activities and support women’s creativity and growth!
news.error: No any news to display at this time.

shop.title: All products
shop.description: Discover beautiful and unique handmade crafts, created with love and care! Choose from a wide selection of handcrafted items that will fill your home with warmth and individuality. Each piece is special – made to bring joy and inspiration. Find your perfect creation today!
shop.noProductsMessage: There are no any available products for this category.
